name: waltti-apc-anonymizer
description: Anonymize accurate APC messages and output GTFS Realtime OccupancyStatus levels

scripts.build: npm run build:quicktype && npm run build:src
scripts.build:quicktype: npm run build:matched-apc && npm run build:profile-collection && npm run build:anonymized-apc
scripts.build:matched-apc: mkdir -p ./src/quicktype && rm -f ./src/quicktype/matchedApc.ts && quicktype --out ./src/quicktype/matchedApc.ts --top-level MatchedApc --lang ts --src-lang schema --src ./quicktype/apc.schema.json --no-date-times --alphabetize-properties --telemetry disable --explicit-unions --converters all-objects && prettier --write ./src/quicktype/matchedApc.ts && export TMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && echo '// @ts-nocheck' > "${TMPFILE}" && cat ./src/quicktype/matchedApc.ts >> "${TMPFILE}" && mv "${TMPFILE}" ./src/quicktype/matchedApc.ts
scripts.build:anonymized-apc: mkdir -p ./src/quicktype && rm -f ./src/quicktype/anonymizedApc.ts && quicktype --out ./src/quicktype/anonymizedApc.ts --top-level AnonymizedApc --lang ts --src-lang schema --src ./quicktype/anonymized-apc.schema.json --no-date-times --alphabetize-properties --telemetry disable --explicit-unions --converters all-objects && prettier --write ./src/quicktype/anonymizedApc.ts && export TMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && echo '// @ts-nocheck' > "${TMPFILE}" && cat ./src/quicktype/anonymizedApc.ts >> "${TMPFILE}" && mv "${TMPFILE}" ./src/quicktype/anonymizedApc.ts
scripts.build:profile-collection: mkdir -p ./src/quicktype && rm -f ./src/quicktype/profileCollection.ts && quicktype --out ./src/quicktype/profileCollection.ts --top-level ProfileCollection --lang ts --src-lang schema --src ./quicktype/profile-collection.schema.json --no-date-times --alphabetize-properties --telemetry disable --explicit-unions --converters all-objects && prettier --write ./src/quicktype/profileCollection.ts && export TMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && echo '// @ts-nocheck' > "${TMPFILE}" && cat ./src/quicktype/profileCollection.ts >> "${TMPFILE}" && mv "${TMPFILE}" ./src/quicktype/profileCollection.ts
scripts.check-and-build: npm run build:quicktype && npm run ts:check && npm run prettier:check && npm run eslint && npm run test && npm run build

author: haphut <haphut@mistmap.com>
